text: Junia Lepida (AD 18 - 65) was a noblewoman in the Roman Empire. Junia was born in the family of Aemilia Lepida and Marcus Junius Silanus Torquatus. She was married to Gaius Cassius Longinus and had two children. ==Sources== * Edmund Groag, Arthur Stein, Leiva Petersen, et alia (edd.), Prosopographia Imperii Romani, Berlin, 1933 - 2016. (PIR2 I 861) Category:18 births Category:65 deaths
title: Junia Lepida
